definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: pant (NH in nn. [[נְשִׁימָה]], [[נְשָׁמָה]], Targum [[נִשְׁמָא]], [[נִשְׁמְתָא]]; late Aram. Ithpe.; Syr n4am breathe, blow; Ar. nasama gently breathe (of wind), etc.; v. seek a thing with labour and perseverance (Lane:3032); nasamah;un a soul, Lane:ib.);—pant, of the deep and strong breathing of a woman in travail;
